AD.name: Enable Fanout Proxy
AD.description: When enabled the Framework acts as a proxy, federating requests to all available sources. All requests are executed as federated queries and resource retrievals, allowing the framework to be the sole component exposing the functionality of all of its Federated Sources.

AD.name: Fanout tag blacklist
AD.description: Ingest operations with tags in this list will be rejected.

AD.name: Fanout proxy tag blacklist
AD.description: Query operations with tags in this list will not be passed through.

AD.name: Query timeout (milliseconds)
AD.description: Time in milliseconds that a query will wait on the queue before timeout.

AD.name: Enable Versioning
AD.description: Enables versioning of both metacards and content.

AD.name: Enable Result Highlighting
AD.description: Enables highlighting of result attributes that match query parameters

AD.name: Poll Interval (minutes)
AD.description: The interval (in minutes) at which to recheck the availability of all sources. Must be at least 1 minute. WARNING: Increasing this value increases the maximum delay for the Source Poller to be updated for when a source availability changes and when sources are created/modified/deleted. See the Documentation for more details.

AD.name: URL
AD.description: Warning: When the embedded document has the same origin as the embedding page, it will have full access to internal apis. Make sure you trust the page.

List of Solr fields that an anyText query expands to include (e.g. title, description, ext.extracted.*). NOTE: If a blacklist is also provided, this list becomes a blacklist exception list instead of a pure whitelist.
AD.name: AnyText Expansion Field Whitelist

AD.description: List of Solr fields that an anyText query will NOT include (e.g. id, checksum, security.*)
AD.name: AnyText Expansion Field Blacklist
